senses.description:
emphasizing sometimes the thought of an entire sentence, but more usually the
        word immediately following
with stress on a particular word
introducing a climax, yea, especially in a rhetorical style

expressing correspondence, especially in the matter of 
        retribution (the גַּם
correlativum)

connecting two ideas which express (or imply) a contradiction, גַּם acquires
    sometimes an adversative force (compare אַף
1 end)
